messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: When the elaborate theft at the Museum of National History was reported, Lieutenant Jannings took immediate charge, liaising closely with Detective Morrisson and Officer Bradley. They formed a quick response team along with Sergeant Turner, Patrol Officer Hayes, and Technician Matthews to handle on-site forensics. Captain Harrows was briefed about the incident and emphasized the importance of retrieving the stolen artifacts. As the team dove deeper, Criminalist Thompson found fingerprints that didn't match any staff. Meanwhile, Officer Rebecca and Officer Howard were patrolling nearby when they stumbled upon suspicious activity that they later reported to Deputy Atkins. A breakthrough came when Dr. Lenton, a renowned archaeologist, provided insights into the artifacts' historical significance, suggesting potential markets for the stolen goods. Coroner Dr. Wilfred, although not directly involved, was consulted about the age of a mummified artifact. Throughout the investigation, Technician Davis and Technician Lyon analyzed various digital footprints, while Detective Mireille and Detective Connor delved into the suspect's background. The investigative team worked around the clock, coordinating with other divisions, ensuring every lead was pursued.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lieutenant Jannings Officer Context: Took charge of the theft at the Museum of National History and liaised with Detective Morrisson and Officer Bradley. Officer Role: Lieutenant  Officer Name: Detective Morrisson Officer Context: Liaised with Lieutenant Jannings and Officer Bradley in response to the museum theft. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Officer Bradley Officer Context: Formed a response team with Detective Morrisson and Lieutenant Jannings after the museum theft. Officer Role: Officer  Officer Name: Sergeant Turner Officer Context: Part of the quick response team for on-site forensics after the museum theft. Officer Role: Sergeant  Officer Name: Patrol Officer Hayes Officer Context: Part of the quick response team for on-site forensics after the museum theft. Officer Role: Patrol Officer  Officer Name: Technician Matthews Officer Context: Handled on-site forensics as a part of the quick response team. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Captain Harrows Officer Context: Was briefed about the museum theft and emphasized the retrieval of stolen artifacts. Officer Role: Captain  Officer Name: Criminalist Thompson Officer Context: Discovered fingerprints at the crime scene that didn't match any of the museum staff. Officer Role: Criminalist  Officer Name: Officer Rebecca Officer Context: Was patrolling nearby the museum and reported suspicious activity to Deputy Atkins. Officer Role: Officer  Officer Name: Officer Howard Officer Context: Alongside Officer Rebecca, stumbled upon suspicious activity and reported it. Officer Role: Officer  Officer Name: Deputy Atkins Officer Context: Received reports of suspicious activity from Officers Rebecca and Howard. Officer Role: Deputy  Officer Name: Dr. Lenton Officer Context: Provided insights into the historical significance of stolen artifacts. Officer Role: Doctor  Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Wilfred Officer Context: Consulted about the age of a mummified artifact. Officer Role: Coroner  Officer Name: Technician Davis Officer Context: Analyzed various digital footprints during the investigation. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Technician Lyon Officer Context: Worked alongside Technician Davis in analyzing digital traces. Officer Role: Technician  Officer Name: Detective Mireille Officer Context: Investigated the suspect's background. Officer Role: Detective  Officer Name: Detective Connor Officer Context: Worked with Detective Mireille in delving into the suspect's background. Officer Role: Detective
